[binaries]
c         = 'x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc'
cpp       = 'x86_64-w64-mingw32-g++'
ar        = 'x86_64-w64-mingw32-ar'
strip     = 'x86_64-w64-mingw32-strip'
pkgconfig = 'pkg-config'

[properties]
sys_root   = '/usr/x86_64-w64-mingw32/sys-root/mingw'

[host_machine]
system     = 'windows'
cpu_family = 'x86_64'
cpu        = 'x86_64'
endian     = 'little'
